resources.name: Detailed information on public opinion website

description:
Slovakia aims to introduce the euro as of 1 January 2009. The survey shall provide for an updated sentiment of the situation shortly before the physical introduction starts.
#####The results by volumes are distributed as follows:
* Volume A: Countries
* Volume AA: Groups of countries
* Volume A' (AP): Trends
* Volume AA' (AAP): Trends of groups of countries
* Volume B: EU/socio-demographics
* Volume C: Country/socio-demographics
title: Flash Eurobarometer 249: Introduction of the euro in Slovakia
name: S720_249
alternative_title: Preparing for the euro changeover in Slovakia
